Useful Links Index

AmeriFlux

  • Levels of data processing

  • AmeriFlux data pipeline

Useful Libraries (R and Python)

Data Prep and Processing

  • atmos - An atmospheric sciences library for Python

  • EddyCleanR - Fills gaps and removes outliers in eddy covariance data.

  • PyFluxPro - Quality control, gap filling and partitioning of flux tower data.

  • REddyProc - Processing data from micrometeorological Eddy-Covariance systems

  • EddyCovarianceProcessing - Code for processing Eddy Covariance

  • flux_capacitor - Tools for processing flux data (eddy covariance).

  • EasyFlux-DL-CR3000 - CR3000 datalogger program for Campbell eddy-covariance systems

  • flux-data-qaqc - Energy Balance Closure Analysis and Eddy Flux Post-Processing

  • eddypro-gui - Software for processing eddy covariance data

  • openeddy - R package for low-frequency eddy covariance data processing

  • ONEFlux - Open Network-Enabled Flux processing pipeline

Partitioning Fluxes

  • fluxpart - Python module for partitioning eddy covariance fluxes

  • ecosystem-transpiration - Estimate transpiration from eddy covariance

Remote Sensing Estimates

  • METRIC - Estimate daily evapotranspiration from Landsat

  • pyTSEB - Two-Source Energy Balance model for ET

  • openet-ssebop-beta - Earth Engine SSEBop ET Model

  • openet-core-beta - OpenET Core Components

  • pymicra - A Python tool for micrometeorological analysis

Miscellaneous

  • Planetary_boundary_height_for_FFP - Extracting boundary layer height from NOAA data

  • amerifluxr - R interface for AmeriFlux data and metadata

  • Open-ET - Open-ET packages

  • atmos-python/atmos - Atmospheric sciences library for Python

Reference ET

  • PyETo - Python package for calculating reference evapotranspiration

  • RefET-GEE - ASCE Reference ET Functions for Google Earth Engine

  • et-demands - Dual crop coefficient crop water demand model

  • openet-refet-gee - ASCE Reference ET Functions for GEE
